variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-fastjsonschema
dependencies.description: Fast JSON schema validator for Python.

dependencies.name: py-hatch-nodejs-version
dependencies.description: Hatch plugin for versioning from a package.json file.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-nbsphinx
dependent_to.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependent_to.name: py-nbclient
dependent_to.description:
A client library for executing notebooks. Formally nbconvert's
ExecutePreprocessor.

dependent_to.name: py-nbval
dependent_to.description:
Py.test plugin for validating Jupyter notebooks. The plugin adds
functionality to py.test to recognise and collect Jupyter notebooks. The
intended purpose of the tests is to determine whether execution of the
stored inputs match the stored outputs of the .ipynb file. Whilst also
ensuring that the notebooks are running without errors.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-jupytext
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts

dependent_to.name: py-ipywidgets
dependent_to.description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook

dependent_to.name: py-nbstripout
dependent_to.description: Strips outputs from Jupyter and IPython notebooks.

dependent_to.name: py-papermill
dependent_to.description: Parametrize and run Jupyter and nteract Notebooks.

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-nbclassic
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook as a Jupyter Server Extension.

dependent_to.name: py-nbdime
dependent_to.description: Diff and merge of Jupyter Notebooks

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-kb-python
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper around kallisto | bustools for scRNA-seq analysis.
